name: CarAttack
description:
CarAttack is a simple racing game where you can choose a few cars and 1 track (in the demo).

CarAttack supports singleplayer as well as online multiplayer.

You can race and obtain powerups by picking up.

Powerups:

Oil: lets your car drift out of place

Rocket: lets your enemies fly into space

Boost: drive fast as in fast and furious (for the family of course)

Bulbbar: for ramming other cars

CarAttack is a demoversion as of now with 3 different cars and 1 track only. i hope you have with it :)

Controls:

Gamepad:

W on Keyboard or RT on Gamepad : gas

S on Keyboard or LT on Gamepad : break

A/D on Keyboard for steering or left stick on Gamepad

Space on Keyboard or B on Gamepad : hand brake

F on  Keyboard or A on Gamepad : shooting powerup

Left on alt Keyboard or X on Gamepad : choose powerup left

left STRG on  Keyboard or Y on Gamepad :choose powerup right

R on  Keyboard or LB on Gamepad : reset car
